org.educraft.block.calculator

Class CalculatorContainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.minecraft.inventory.Container
      • org.educraft.block.calculator.CalculatorContainer

  • public class CalculatorContainer
extends net.minecraft.inventory.Container
    This class is used to keep track of a particular BlockCalculator's inventory. It manages multiple users, allowing several players to use the same calculator.

      • onContainerClosed

        public void onContainerClosed(net.minecraft.entity.player.EntityPlayer player)
        Called whenever the container is closed. If no one is using the container any more, then it should drop everything inside it, like a crafting table.
        Overrides:
        onContainerClosed in class net.minecraft.inventory.Container
        Parameters:
        player - the player who closed the container
